details.description: Oral examination of the work involving one or more tutors (assessors) and the individual/group being assessed. May involve the exploration of theoretic knowledge of the students, or may be centered around a document or artifact that they have produced.
details.applicability: Useful for discussion of open ended work, with many right answers and debatable results
details.consequences: Can disadvantage less confident students and non first-language students.
